languages.text: "Я знаю, к чему вы клоните. Используете веру, как щит от своей несдержанности? Простите, но палаты Адептус Администратум есть место тишины, созерцания... и смирения. И я не стану той, кто нарушит покой служителей Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "Я знаю, к чему вы клоните. Используете веру, как щит от своей несдержанности? Простите, но палаты Адептус Администратум есть место тишины, созерцания... и смирения. И я не стану той, кто нарушит покой служителей Лекс Импереалис".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю, к чему вы клоните. Используете веру, как щит от своей несдержанности? Простите, но палаты Адептус Администратум есть место тишины, созерцания... и смирения. И я не стану той, кто нарушит покой служителей Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我知道你打算让我做什么。你打算用信仰做挡箭牌，为你缺乏节制的举动作掩护，是吧？请原谅我，帝国内政部的大殿是个代表安宁、深思……与服从的地方。那些仆人行使着帝国的律法，我并不打算扰乱他们的秩序。”
languages.original_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “我知道你打算让我做什么。你打算用信仰做挡箭牌，为你缺乏节制的举动作掩护，是吧？请原谅我，帝国内政部的大殿是个代表安宁、深思……与服从的地方。那些仆人行使着帝国的律法，我并不打算扰乱他们的秩序。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Sé lo que está sugiriendo. ¿Pretende usar la fe como escudo para ocultar tu falta de templanza? Discúlpeme, pero el palacio del Adeptus Administratum es un lugar de silenciosa contemplación... y sumisión. No perturbaré la paz de los sirvientes de la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Sé lo que está sugiriendo. ¿Pretende usar la fe como escudo para ocultar tu falta de templanza? Discúlpeme, pero el palacio del Adeptus Administratum es un lugar de silenciosa contemplación... y sumisión. No perturbaré la paz de los sirvientes de la Lex Imperialis».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「言いたいことはわかりました。ジェイは足りない自制心を隠すのに、信仰を利用するつもりなのでしょう？失礼ですが、帝国行政局の宮殿は静かな思索場所であり…書類の提出場所だ。レックス・インペリア号の職員らの平穏を妨げるつもりはありません」
languages.original_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「言いたいことはわかりました。ジェイは足りない自制心を隠すのに、信仰を利用するつもりなのでしょう？失礼ですが、帝国行政局の宮殿は静かな思索場所であり…書類の提出場所だ。レックス・インペリア号の職員らの平穏を妨げるつもりはありません」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je sais très bien ce que vous avez derrière la tête. Vous devriez avoir honte de vous servir de la foi comme d'un bouclier pour masquer votre manque de retenue. Sauf votre respect, le palais de l'Adeptus Administratum est un lieu de recueillement... et de soumission. Ne comptez pas sur moi pour troubler la paix des serviteurs de la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais très bien ce que vous avez derrière la tête. Vous devriez avoir honte de vous servir de la foi comme d'un bouclier pour masquer votre manque de retenue. Sauf votre respect, le palais de l'Adeptus Administratum est un lieu de recueillement... et de soumission. Ne comptez pas sur moi pour troubler la paix des serviteurs de la Lex Imperialis. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich weiß, was Ihr da vorschlagt. Benutzt Ihr den Glauben als Schild, um Euren Mangel an Zurückhaltung zu verbergen? Verzeiht, aber der Palast des Adeptus Administratum ist ein Ort der stillen Besinnung ... und Unterwerfung. Und ich werde den Frieden der Diener des Lex Imperia nicht stören."
languages.original_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, was Ihr da vorschlagt. Benutzt Ihr den Glauben als Schild, um Euren Mangel an Zurückhaltung zu verbergen? Verzeiht, aber der Palast des Adeptus Administratum ist ein Ort der stillen Besinnung ... und Unterwerfung. Und ich werde den Frieden der Diener des Lex Imperia nicht stören."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne ima ettiğini anladım. Acaba imanı kalkan yapıp kendine hâkim olamayışını saklamaya çalışıyor olabilir misin? Affedersin ama Adeptus Administratum Sarayı, sessizce düşüncelere dalıp huşu hissedilecek bir yerdir. Lex İmperialis'in hizmetkârlarının huzurunu bozacak değilim."
languages.original_text: "I know what you are suggesting. Are you using faith as a shield to hide your lack of restraint? Forgive me, but the Palace of the Adeptus Administratum is a place of quiet contemplation... and submission. And I will not disturb the peace of the servants of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Ne ima ettiğini anladım. Acaba imanı kalkan yapıp kendine hâkim olamayışını saklamaya çalışıyor olabilir misin? Affedersin ama Adeptus Administratum Sarayı, sessizce düşüncelere dalıp huşu hissedilecek bir yerdir. Lex İmperialis'in hizmetkârlarının huzurunu bozacak değilim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
